name: Cyber Vampire Assassins From Space
description:
Vampires trapped in a Spaceship! Guards with flamethrowers! Eat them or get burned!

Arrow Keys to Move - Space to Restart

This prototype was made for the Berlin Minigame Jam - April 2016 in 8 hours

The theme was "From the Shadows" and I only managed to complete a rough prototype of the framework.

Things I wanted to try out, and maybe update later

  • Multiple Vampires that the player can control
  • A "Light source" around the Vampires so they do not see all the
  • Bloodsucking Mechanic to regain Health
